translation.header.choose.special.action.you: You can choose One special action tile or <pass>Pass</pass>
translation.header.choose.special.action.player: {player} can choose One special action tile
translation.header.action.opponent.you: You can choose an action for the opponent or <pass>Pass</pass>
translation.header.cabaret.you: You can place an influence token on cabaret
translation.header.cabaret.player: {player} can place an influence token on cabaret
translation.header.cabaret.star.you: You can place an influence token on cabaret on a star case
translation.header.cabaret.star.player: {player} can place an influence token on cabaret on a star case
translation.header.cabaret.near.to.other.you: You can place an influence token on cabaret, near to one other token
translation.header.cabaret.near.to.other.player: {player} can place an influence token on cabaret, near to one other token
translation.header.cabaret.near.to.last.you: You can place an influence token on cabaret, near to last token you place
translation.header.cabaret.near.to.last.player: {player} can place an influence token on cabaret, near to last token he/she place
translation.header.race.track.you: You can place an influence token on a race track
translation.header.race.track.player: {player} can place an influence token on a race track
translation.header.race.track.another.you: You can place an influence token on another race track
translation.header.race.track.another.player: {player} can place an influence token on another race track
translation.header.race.track.same.you: You can place an influence token on same race track
translation.header.race.track.same.player: {player} can place an influence token on same race track
translation.header.show.character.you: You can show two character tiles and switch them or <pass>Pass</pass>
translation.header.show.character.player: {player} can show two character tiles and switch them
translation.header.switch.tokens.you: You can switch one token with opponent's token or <pass>Pass</pass>
translation.header.switch.tokens.player: {player} can switch one token with opponent's token
translation.header.cabaret.or.race.you: You can place an influence token on cabaret, near to one other token or on a race track or <pass>Pass</pass>
translation.header.cabaret.or.race.player: {player} can place an influence token on cabaret, near to one other token or on a race track
translation.header.end.same.color.player: {player} wins the game by owning 3 characters in the same suit
translation.header.end.all.colors.player: {player} wins the game by owning at least 1 character of each of the 5 suits
translation.header.end.score.player: {player} wins the game with {winnerScore} points to {loserScore} points
translation.header.end.characters.player: {player} wins the game with {winnerCharacters} character tiles to {loserCharacters} character tiles
translation.help.character.tile.description: There are <bold>15 character tiles</bold> grouped into <bold>5 different families</bold> recognizable by their colors. Only <bold>12 cards are in play per game</bold>.
translation.help.character.tile.rallying.description: The locations hold the characters you will <bold>share with your opponent</bold>. Rallying the characters will be <bold>different depending on where they are</bold>. Whenever you meet a location’s condition, you take the corresponding character at the end of the turn, <bold>always after resolving all actions</bold>.
translation.help.character.tile.end.description: The game ends at the end of a turn, as soon as you or your opponent meet <bold>one of these two victory conditions</bold>:
translation.help.character.tile.end.condition.1: owning <bold>3 characters in the same suit</bold>.
translation.help.character.tile.end.condition.2: owning at least <bold>1 character of each of the 5 suits</bold>.
translation.help.character.tile.end.victory: The player who ended the game this way <bold>immediately wins the game</bold>.
translation.help.character.tile.end.other: If the last character of a location is rallied <bold>and none</bold> of these victory conditions is met, <bold>the game immediately ends</bold>. In this case, the winner is the player who has the <bold>most prestige stars on characters</bold> they have rallied. Gain <bold>1 extra prestige point</bold> if you have a Special Action tile on your side of the board, and <bold>1 extra Prestige point</bold> for each Special Action tile you have set aside during the game. In case of a <bold>tie</bold>, the player with the <bold>most characters</bold> wins.
translation.help.board.description: The board is divided in 4 areas. All 3 locations (<cabaret>Cabaret</cabaret>, <finance>Finance Center</finance> and <race>Racetrack</race>) host characters. <bold>The Actions area</bold> allows you to exert influence over each of the 3 locations thanks to the different Actions.
translation.help.board.actions.1: Place 2 tokens on the Cabaret. The first token you place must be <bold>orthogonally adjacent to another token already in play</bold>. The second token must be <bold>adjacent to the token you just placed</bold>
translation.help.board.actions.2: Place 1 token at the Cabaret. It must be <bold>orthogonally adjacent to another token</bold>. Then, advance your Ascension token in the Finance Center. Your token advances <bold>one space if it is at the same level as your opponent’s or higher</bold>. If it is lower, <bold>it advances two spaces</bold>.
translation.help.board.actions.3: Advance your Ascension token in the Finance Center. Your token advances <bold>one space if it is at the same level as your opponent’s or higher</bold>. If it is lower, <bold>it advances two spaces</bold>. Then place a token at the Racetrack. It must be placed on a <bold>row that is still available</bold>, and on the <bold>leftmost empty space of that row</bold>
translation.help.board.actions.4: Place 2 tokens at the Racetrack. They must be placed on <bold>two different rows that are still available</bold>, on the <bold>leftmost empty space of the row</bold>. If there is only one row left, <bold>only place one token</bold>.
translation.help.board.actions.special: Dorothy and James also have a personal space on their side of the Actions area. It receives the <bold>Special Action tiles players may obtain during the game</bold>.
translation.help.board.bonus: On each location, you will find <bonus>bonus spaces</bonus> that grant extra effects when you reach them
translation.help.cabaret.description.1: To obtain characters in the Cabaret, you must place  your Influence tokens on the right spaces!  Forming a continuous path from one edge of the  board to the opposite edge with orthogonally adjacent Influence tokens in your color allows you to obtain, at the end of the turn, the matching character.
translation.help.cabaret.description.2: The bottom character is obtained with the <star/> spaces.
translation.help.cabaret.description.3: If you occupy all 4 <star/> spaces with your Influence tokens, you rally the character at the end of the turn.
translation.help.cabaret.description.4: Each time you place a token in the Cabaret, it must be orthogonally adjacent to another token, whoever the owner of that token is.
translation.help.finance.description.1: At the Finance Center, you make your Ascension token progress in the building, from the bottom towards the top. If your token reaches or moves over a character, you rally them at the end of the turn. Doing so, you will reveal a bonus space your opponent can benefit from, as a compensation, when they reach or move over that space.
translation.help.finance.description.2: Each time your Ascension token progresses in the Finance Center, by any means, you climb 1 space if your token is at the same level or higher than your opponent’s Ascension token. If your token is lower than your opponent’s, it climbs 2 spaces instead of one.
translation.help.race.description.1: At the Racetrack, you place your tokens on the tracks to win majorities. Each time you play a token there, place it on a track that is still available, on the leftmost empty space. Once a track is complete, at the end of a turn, the player with the most tokens on that track wins the corresponding tile. It is possible, in a single turn, to complete a track and change the majority of that track, for example with bonuses.
translation.help.race.description.2: Once the character has been taken, give back all tokens on this track to their owners and place a Race Finished overlay tile on the corresponding track. This track becomes unavailable for the remainder of the game and no one can place any tokens on it.
translation.help.bonus.description: On all 3 locations, spaces with bonuses can be found. At the Cabaret and the Racetrack, apply a bonus as soon <bold>as you place a token on it</bold>. At the Finance Center, apply a bonus as soon as you reach it or move over it. These bonuses are always optional
translation.help.bonus.bonus.1: Your Ascension token advances one  space towards the top of the Finance  Center. It moves up one space if it is  at the same level as your opponent’s  or higher.  It moves up two spaces if it is below.
translation.help.bonus.bonus.2: At the beginning of your opponent’s  next turn, choose which action they  must play. It may be their special  action, if they have one.  The tile must be discarded after use.  You may not choose the action you  just took this way.
translation.help.bonus.bonus.3: Swap one of your Influence tokens  with an Influence token from your  opponent. You may swap tokens  from the same location, or from  2 different locations.  Swapping tokens does not  reactivate bonuses.
translation.help.bonus.bonus.4: Place one of your Influence tokens  at the Cabaret or at the Racetrack.  At the Cabaret, it must be adjacent  to any token already in play. At the  Racetrack, it must be placed on the  leftmost empty space of any row of  your choosing that is still available.
translation.help.bonus.bonus.5:
Take 2 characters from the board.  They can be face up and/or face  down, and they can come from  different locations. Secretly look at  any face down characters, and keep  their identity secret.
You may then choose to swap their  places without changing their state  (face up stays face up, face down  stays face down).  If both characters were face down,  do not tell your opponent whether  you have swapped them or not.
translation.help.bonus.bonus.6: Draw 3 Special Action tiles, choose  one and place it in your dedicated  space of the board.  Discard the 2 other tiles.  If you already had a Special Action  on your dedicated space, you may  keep it or place the newly selected  Special Action tile in its place. In any  case, you can only have one Special  Action tile. Set aside the tile you do  not wish to keep. It may be worth 1  Prestige point at the end of the game.  Special Actions are described at  the end of this booklet.
translation.help.actiontoken.description: the action token identifies <bold>the action you wish to perform</bold>. It has 2 sides, one for Dorothy and one for James.
translation.help.ascensiontoken.description: The ascension token allows you to climb the stories of the financial center
translation.help.cabarettile.description: The 4 cabaret tiles are shuffled at the beginning of the game and <bold>randomly placed</bold> in cabaret space.
translation.help.influencetoken.description: Influence tokens allow you to play in the <bold>cabaret</bold> or the <bold>racetrack</bold>.
translation.help.raceFinishedOverlay.description.1: The race finished overlay tile is placed on a track once the corresponding character has been taken.
translation.help.raceFinishedOverlay.description.2: This track becomes <bold>unavailable for the remainder of the game</bold> and no one can place any tokens on it.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.description.1: There are <bold>11 different</bold> special action tiles
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.description.2: When you pick up a special action tile, you must place it in your character's dedicated space (left for Dorothy, right for James).
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.description.3: If you already had a Special Action on your dedicated space, you may keep it or place the newly selected Special Action tile in its place. In any case, <bold>you can only have one Special Action tile</bold>. Set aside the tile you do not wish to keep.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.description.4: At the end of the game, the <bold>tiles set aside</bold> and the <bold>remaining tile on the dedicated space</bold> earn 1 prestige point <bold>each</bold>.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.1: Place 1 Influence token at the Racetrack, on an empty space of your choice.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.2: Swap one of your Influence tokens with one of your opponent’s Influence tokens. Then place an Influence token on the Racetrack, on an available row, on its leftmost free space.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.3: Place 3 Influence tokens at the Racetrack on 3 different available rows. If there are less than 3 available rows, only place a token on the available row(s).
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.4: Place 2 Influence tokens on a single available row of the Racetrack, on the 2 leftmost empty spaces.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.5: Swap 2 Character tiles, then advance your Ascension token in the Finance Center. Finally, swap 1 of your Influence tokens with one of your opponent’s Influence tokens. You must take those 3 actions in that order.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.6: Advance your Ascension token in the Finance Center twice. If the first move puts you on the same level or higher than your opponent, the second move only progresses you one space up.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.7: Place 1 Influence token at the Cabaret, adjacent to a token already in play, whoever its owner is. Then advance your Ascension token in the Finance Center. Then place 1 Influence token at the Racetrack, on the leftmost empty space of an available track. You must take those 3 actions in that order.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.8: Place 1 Influence token at the Cabaret, on the empty space of your choice.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.9: Place 1 Influence token at the Cabaret. It must be orthogonally adjacent to another token already in play, whoever their owner is. Then swap one of your Influence tokens with one of your opponent’s Influence tokens.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.10: Place 3 Influence tokens at the Cabaret. The first must be adjacent to a token already in play. The second one must be adjacent to the first, and the third, adjacent to the second.
translation.help.SpecialActionTile.action.11: Place 2 Influence tokens at the Cabaret. Each must be adjacent to a token in play, but the tokens you place this way do not have to be adjacent.
translation.history.choose.action.player: {player} chooses the {actionId, select, 1{Cabaret} 2{cabaret / finance center} 3{finance center / racetrack} other{racetrack}} action
translation.history.choose.action.opponent.player: {player} chooses the {actionId, select, 1{Cabaret} 2{cabaret / finance center} 3{finance center / racetrack} other{racetrack}} action for {opponent}
translation.history.get.character.player: {player} gets a <0>character tile</0> in {locationId, select, 1{cabaret} 2{finance center} other{racetrack}}
translation.history.cabaret.bonus.player: {player} places token in cabaret and get <0>{bonus, select, 7{advance in finance center} 10{switch influence tokens} 11{place token on cabaret or racetrack} 12{choose special action tile} 14{show two character tiles} other{choose action for opponent}} bonus</0>.
translation.history.race.bonus.player: {player} places token in race track and get <0>{bonus, select, 7{advance in finance center} 10{switch influence tokens} 11{place token on cabaret or racetrack} 12{choose special action tile} 14{show two character tiles} other{choose action for opponent}} bonus</0>.
translation.history.finance.bonus.player: {player} advances in finance center and get <0>{bonus, select, 7{advance in finance center} 10{switch influence tokens} 11{place token on cabaret or racetrack} 12{choose special action tile} 14{show two character tiles} other{choose action for opponent}} bonus</0>.
translation.sign-in-to-chat: You must sign in to chat
translation.failure.dialog.network: An action could not be completed and was canceled. Are you still connected to the Internet?
translation.failure.dialog.play: The action you played is not allowed.
translation.failure.dialog.play2: If the problem persists, try to <0>reload the game</0>
translation.failure.dialog.undo: The other players have already played, your move could not be canceled.
translation.Move not expected in the tutorial: Move not expected in the tutorial
translation.failure.dialog.tutorial: You will soon be free to make your own choices! Let us show you the last information...
translation.giveup.title: Give up the game
translation.giveup.robot: You will be eliminated and replaced by a robot playing at random.
translation.giveup.competitive: The game will count as an overall loss.
translation.giveup.friendly: Your friends will be able to finish the game without you.
translation.giveup.tournament: You will also abandon the tournament.
translation.giveup.last.choice: You can cancel the game, claim victory, or complete the game against a random robot if you like.
translation.giveup.last.choice.competitive: If you choose to finish the game against the robot, you'll still win the ranking points at the end of the game.
translation.quit.player: {player} left the game and conceded victory.
translation.quit.player.ejected: {player} has been excluded from the game.
translation.quit.you.ejected: You've been excluded from the game for having overstayed your thinking time.
translation.eject.dialog.p2: Beyond {duration} you will be allowed to eject them and continue the game.
translation.eject.dialog.p3: If you don’t think they are coming back, you have the option to eject them from the game.
translation.fs.dialog.p1: This game is designed for landscape mode, we recommend you flip your screen.
translation.result.comp.tie.you: Tie! You share victory with {tied, plural, one{#other player} other{#other players}}.
translation.result.comp.tie.all: Tie! The players share the victory.
translation.result.score.victory: Congratulations, you win the game with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}!
translation.result.score.winner: {player} wins the game with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}
translation.result.score.tie.you: Tie! With {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}, you share victory with {tied, plural, one{# other player} other{#other players}}.
translation.result.score.tie.other: Tie! {tied} players share victory with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.result.score.tie.all: Tie! Players share victory with {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.game.over.concede.victory: You win the game by forfeit!
translation.time.title: Players thinking time
translation.tuto.over:
Congratulations, you've completed the tutorial!
Ready to play with other players?

translation.sign-in-to-chat: Vous devez vous connecter pour discuter
translation.failure.dialog.network: Une action n’a pas pu aboutir et a été annulée. Êtes-vous toujours connecté·e à Internet ?
translation.failure.dialog.play: L’action que vous avez jouée n’est pas autorisée.
translation.failure.dialog.play2: Si le problème persiste, vous pouvez <0>rafraîchir la partie</0>
translation.failure.dialog.undo: Les autres joueurs ont déjà joué, votre coup n’a pas pu être annulé.
translation.Move not expected in the tutorial: Coup non prévu dans le tutoriel
translation.failure.dialog.tutorial: Promis, vous serez bientôt libre de vos choix ! Nous allons vous réafficher la dernière information...
translation.giveup.title: Abandonner la partie
translation.giveup.robot: Vous serez éliminé et remplacé par un robot jouant au hasard.
translation.giveup.competitive: La partie comptera comme une défaite au classement général.
translation.giveup.friendly: Vos amis pourront terminer la partie sans vous.
translation.giveup.tournament: Vous allez également abandonner le tournoi.
translation.giveup.last: Vous êtes le dernier joueur en jeu
translation.giveup.last.choice: Vous pouvez annuler la partie, prendre la victoire ou continuer la partie contre un robot jouant au hasard si vous le souhaitez.
translation.giveup.last.choice.competitive: Si vous choississez de terminer la partie contre le robot, vous gagnerez quoi qu'il arrive les points au classement à la fin de la partie.
translation.giveup.last.choice.tournament: Vous pouvez immédiatement prendre la victoire.
translation.quit.player: {player} a quitté la partie et concédé la victoire.
translation.quit.player.ejected: {player} a été exclu de la partie.
translation.quit.you.ejected: Vous avez été exclu de la partie pour avoir trop dépassé votre temps de réflexion.
translation.eject.dialog.p1: {player} a dépassé son temps de réflexion
translation.eject.dialog.p2: Au-delà de {duration} de dépassement vous pourrez l’expulser et poursuivre la partie.
translation.eject.dialog.p3: Si vous pensez qu’il·elle ne reviendra pas, vous avez la possibilité de l’expulser de la partie.
translation.fs.dialog.p1: Ce jeu est conçu pour le mode paysage, nous vous conseillons de tourner votre écran.
translation.fs.dialog.p2: Vous pouvez aussi passer en plein écran.
translation.result.comp.tie.you: Égalité ! Vous partagez la victoire avec {tied, plural, one{# autre joueur} other{#autres joueurs}}.
translation.result.comp.tie.all: Égalité ! Les joueurs partagent la victoire.
translation.result.score.victory: Bravo, vous remportez la partie avec {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}} !
translation.result.score.winner: {player} remporte la partie avec {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}
translation.result.score.tie.you: Égalité ! Avec {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}, vous partagez la victoire avec {tied, plural, one{# autre joueur} other{#autres joueurs}}.
translation.result.score.tie.other: Égalité ! {tied} joueurs partagent la victoire avec {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.result.score.tie.all: Égalité ! Les joueurs partagent la victoire avec {score, plural, one{# point} other{# points}}.
translation.game.over.concede.victory: Vous remportez la partie par forfait !
translation.time.title: Temps de réflexion des joueurs
translation.tuto.over:
Félicitations, vous avez terminé le tutoriel !
Prêt⸱e à jouer avec d’autres joueurs ?

translation.failure.dialog.network: Eine Aktion konnte nicht abgeschlossen werden und wurde abgebrochen. Bitte überprüfe dein Internetverbindung.
translation.failure.dialog.play: Die Aktion, die du ausführen wolltest, ist nicht erlaubt.
translation.failure.dialog.play2: Falls das Problem weiterhin besteht, <0>lade die Partie neu</0>
translation.failure.dialog.undo: Die anderen haben ihre Züge bereits ausgeführt. Du kannst deinen Zug nicht rückgängig machen.
translation.Move not expected in the tutorial: Dieser Zug ist im Tutorial nicht vorgesehen
translation.failure.dialog.tutorial: Im Anschluss darfst du deine eigenen Entscheidungen treffen! Sieh dir erst noch die Regeln des Spiels an
translation.giveup.title: Spiel aufgeben
translation.giveup.robot: Du wirst aus dem Spiel ausscheiden und durch einen Computergegner ersetzt.
translation.giveup.competitive: Das Spiel wird als Niederlage gewertet.
translation.giveup.friendly: Deine Freunde haben die Möglichkeit das Spiel ohne dich zu beenden.
translation.eject.dialog.p2: Nach {duration} dürft ihr diesen Spieler aus der Partie entfernen und weiterspielen.
translation.eject.dialog.p3: Falls ihr denkt, dass der Spieler nicht zurückkehrt, dürft ihr ihn aus der Partie entfernen.
translation.fs.dialog.p1: Das Spiel wurde für Querformat (Landscape Mode) entwickelt. Wir empfehlen dir deinen Bildschirm zu drehen.
translation.fs.dialog.p2: Du kannst auch in den Vollbildmodus wechseln.
translation.time.title: Bedenkzeit der Spieler

translation.sign-in-to-chat: Вы должны зарегистрироваться для использования чата
translation.failure.dialog.network: Действие не могло быть завершено и было отменено. Проверьте ваше подключение к интернету.
translation.failure.dialog.play2: Если проблема не исчезнет, попробуйте <0>перезагрузить игру</0>
translation.failure.dialog.undo: Другой игрок уже походил, и вы не можете отменить свой ход.
translation.failure.dialog.tutorial: Скоро вы сможете играть сами! Позвольте нам показать последнюю информацию...
translation.giveup.title: Сдаться в игре
translation.giveup.robot: Вы покините игру и будете заменены на бота со случайными ходами.
translation.giveup.friendly: Ваши друзья смогут закончить игру без вас.
translation.eject.dialog.p2: После превышения предела в {duration} вы сможете удалить игрока из игры и продолжить без него.
translation.eject.dialog.p3: Если вы считаете, что игрок не вернётся, вы можете удалить его из игры.
translation.fs.dialog.p1: Игра разработана для ландшафтного режима. Мы рекомендуем вам повернуть экран.
translation.fs.dialog.p2: Вы можете также перейти в полноэкранный режим
